00034 QVariant FileBuildersModel::data( const QModelIndex& index, 
00035                                                                  int role /*= Qt::DisplayRole */ ) const {
00036 
00037         if (!index.isValid())
00038                 return QVariant();
00039 
00040         // if row is invalid
00041         else if (index.row() < 0 || index.row() >= table_.size())
00042                 return QVariant();
00043 
00044         if (Qt::DisplayRole == role) {
00045                 
00046                 switch (index.column()) {
00047                         case 0:
00048                                 return table_.at(index.row())->getFileType();
00049                         case 1:
00050                                 return table_.at(index.row())->getCommand();
00051                         case 2:
00052                                 return table_.at(index.row())->getFlags();
00053                         case 3:
00054                                 return table_.at(index.row())->getReplaceDefaultFlags();
00055                         default:
00056                                 return QVariant();
00057                 }
00058         }
00059         // if unsupported role
00060         else {
00061                 return QVariant();
00062         }
00063 }

00065 QVariant FileBuildersModel::headerData( int section, Qt::Orientation orientation, 
00066                                                                            int role /*= Qt::DisplayRole */ ) const {
00067

00069                 return QVariant();
00070

00072

00074                         case 0:

00076                         case 1:

00078                         case 2:
00079                                 return tr("Flags");
00080                         case 3:

00082                         default:

00088                 return QVariant();

00091 bool FileBuildersModel::setData( const QModelIndex& index, 
00092                                                                 const QVariant& value, 
00093                                                                 int role /*= Qt::EditRole */ ) {
00094 
00095         if (!index.isValid())
00096                 return false;
00097 
00098         // if row is invalid
00099         else if (index.row() < 0 || index.row() >= table_.size())
00100                 return false;
00101 
00102         if (Qt::EditRole == role) {
00103 
00104                 switch (index.column()) {
00105                         case 0: {
00106                                 table_.at(index.row())->setFileType(value.toString());
00107                                 break;
00108                                         }
00109                         case 1: {
00110                                 table_.at(index.row())->setCommand(value.toString());
00111                                 break;
00112                                         }
00113                         case 2: {
00114                                 table_.at(index.row())->setFlags(value.toString());
00115                                 break;
00116                                         }
00117                         case 3: {
00118                                 table_.at(index.row())->setReplaceDefaultFlags(value.toBool());
00119                                 break;
00120                                         }
00121                         default:
00122                                 return false;
00123                 }
00124 
00125                 emit contentChanged();
00126                 return true;
00127         }
00128         // if unsupported role
00129         else
00130                 return false;
00131 }

00140 bool FileBuildersModel::isValid() const {
00141         
00142         // check all file builders
00143         foreach (QSharedPointer<FileBuilder> fileBuilder, table_) {
00144 
00145                 // if one is invalid
00146                 if (!fileBuilder->isValid())
00147                         return false;
00148         }
00149         return true;
00150 }

00152 void FileBuildersModel::apply() {
00153         // remove previous file builders
00154         fileBuilders_->clear();
00155 
00156         *fileBuilders_ = table_;
00157 }
00158 
00159 void FileBuildersModel::restore() {
00160         beginResetModel();
00161         table_.clear();
00162         table_ = *fileBuilders_;
00163         endResetModel();
00164 }

00166 void FileBuildersModel::onRemoveRow( int row ) {
00167 
00168         // if row is invalid
00169         if (row < 0 || row >= table_.size())
00170                 return;
00171 
00172         beginRemoveRows(QModelIndex(), row, row);
00173 
00174         // remove the object from the map
00175         table_.removeAt(row);
00176 
00177         endRemoveRows();
00178 
00179         // tell also parent widget that contents have been changed
00180         emit contentChanged();
00181 }
00182 
00183 void FileBuildersModel::onAddRow() {
00184 
00185         beginInsertRows(QModelIndex(), table_.size(), table_.size());
00186 
00187         table_.append(QSharedPointer<FileBuilder>(new FileBuilder()));
00188 
00189         endInsertRows();
00190 
00191         // tell also parent widget that contents have been changed
00192         emit contentChanged();
00193 }
